alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 8:52AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Wakulla, southern Liberty and north central Franklin Counties through 915 AM EST... At 851 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 11 miles northwest of Carrabelle to 12 miles north of Eastpoint. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Morgan Place, Arran, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Tully, Panacea, Owens Bridge, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Medart, Kern, Buckhorn, Wilma, Twin Pole and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
